resources.string:
1.0 Introduction to Android\n\n
Android is an ecosystem Android platform architecture Android Versions Challenges of Android app development App fundamentals\n
Android Ecosystem Mobile operating system based on Linux kernel User Interface for touch screens Used on over 80% of all smartphones Powers devices such as watches, TVs, and cars Over 2 Million Android apps in Google Play store Highly customizable for devices / by vendors Open source The entire feature-set of the Android OS is available to you through APIs written in the Java language.\n
View class hierarchy to create UI screens Notification manager Activity manager for life cycles and navigation\n
The entire feature-set of the Android OS is available to you through APIs written in the Java language.
